strapiPost.title: Best Friends Pet Resource Center Attempts World Record
strapiPost.content:
In conjunction with National Rescue Dog Day, Best Friends Animal Society will attempt a world record for the Largest Dog Food Donation and invites the public to join the announcement ceremony this Saturday, May 20.

  • Good doge: Aiming to crush the current record of 51,000 lbs, Best Friends has partnered with Baby Doge Community, J.B. Hunt, and several dog food partners â€“ Blue Buffalo, Nestle Purina, I and Love and You, and Trisha Yearwood Pet Collection.
  • Share the love: The food will be officially weighed on Friday at a J.B. Hunt facility, then be transferred to the Best Friends Pet Resource Center in Bentonville for the potential record announcement and distribution to local shelters. A large portion will be available to the public for free on Saturday from 1-4p!

Keep up with Best Friends NWA on Facebook and Instagram for updates, and learn more HERE.
